document.full_text: two powerful bombs detonated by suspected muslim insurgents killed two paramilitary rangers and wounded nine in separate attacks in southern thailand on saturday, police said, the latest unrest in the troubled region bordering malaysia.
document.title: bombs kill two rangers in thailand's restive south
lines_and_colors: two powerful bombs detonated by suspected muslim insurgents killed two paramilitary rangers and wounded nine in separate attacks in southern thailand on saturday, police said, the latest unrest in the troubled region bordering malaysia.
